alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 2:04PM MST until March 10 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 4500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Areas above 4500 feet near Grand Canyon and North Rim. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will taper off from north to south after 6 PM MST. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 11 PM Today: Grand Canyon 0 to 1 inches North Rim 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
